name: Event Horizon: Space Shooter Game
description:
Event Horizon is a classic fast-paced space shooter game with additional mechanics where you must strategize to beat your foes.

The earth is on a brink of destruction as Type-III extraterrestrial species launched a surprise attack on our star system. Can your team of space fighters beat this endless wave of attacks from our hostile neighbors?

Features:

* Endless Waves
As you progress in the game, you will fight an infinite number of enemies. The longer you survive, the more rewards you can gain.

* Endless Achievements
With the endless gameplay, there should also be an endless number of achievements you can earn in the game.

* Endless Possibility
Explore the endless space, unlock all of the available ships, upgrade your ships as high as you can, create different strategies, discover lots of enemy types, with all of this endless possibilities will make every run unique and fun!
